text: Wantendelaga yajukusaka, kutandila yumba yammakome gakunyang’amala, itusitusi, mataalo (mabeseni) gamakulungwa ganti mpela matanda, kwisa soni majanje gachitamile (pachisisa ligongo lya ukulu nnope). (Twasalile kuti): “Panganyani, E waliwasa lya Daudi! (Masengo gambone gakulosya) kutogolela (ukoto wampedwile).” Sano wannonope mwa achikapolo Wangu ni wali wakutogolela
